pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Sunday, March 15, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with President of the European Commission, Ursula von der Leyen.

The Prime Minister will speak with President of the European Council, Charles Michel.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.

Media appearances

10:10 a.m.  An interview with the Prime Minister will air on LCN, and will re-air on LCN and TVA at 12:00 p.m.

11:00 a.m.  An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CTV’s Question Period.
